description: Chii-chan is a classmate of Kouta. She is first seen waiting for him on a summer day in front of a convenience store. She is not very bright, and her horrible performance in school is a source of embarrassment for her. She asks Kouta to be her tutor, hoping he can help improve her grades. Kouta agrees to help her, which leads to Chii-chan offering sexual favors in exchange for his tutoring.
name: Shiina Chieri
